short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Increase Friend list and make it more valuable with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lead Generator

Feather is an organic marketing tool that helps entrepreneurs start valuable conversations with their ideal prospects from Facebook.

Typically what had to be done in the past was to manually send friend requests to possible prospects and then once it’s accepted, you might start a conversation with them.

Now, with Feather, you can send friend requests on autopilot using targeted keywords that your prospects self-identify with from ANY Facebook group, Facebook post, Facebook ad, Facebook page or influencer that your ideal customers interact with online.

Feather can automatically send a “welcome” message on your behalf (and even use their name for increased response rates) to start the conversations with new targeted potential prospects every single day.

To make everything easier, you can also set up “Canned Responses” in Feather. Doing so allows you to simply click a button to enter a commonly used sentence, paragraph, phrase, or image - including emojis. This auto-fills your text field so that you can edit and double-check the message before you send it!

Feather is the world's best automation app for entrepreneurs that use (or would like to use) social media to get high-paying clients and a stream of leads directly into their Messenger inbox!
